description: This file is a shell script providing CLI tools to manage OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, and executing commands within containers. It interacts with a local REST API via curl commands and contains functions for various container operations.
external_files: curl command (interacts with the API endpoint at http://127.0.0.1:9998/Service/)

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container using an OCI bundle from a specified directory or path.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby spec JSON file from the specified directory.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command within a specific container with optional parameters.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information about available commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop of the CLI tool, reads user input and dispatches commands.
